title: [转载][汉化][娱乐] SkyBlock——可以和PC上ASkyBlock媲美的空岛生存插件
author: PQguanfang
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SL小组 于 2019-9-9 22:30 编辑 

指令
/is visit 玩家名字 访问这个玩家的空岛
/is transfer 玩家名字 转让空岛给对应玩家
/is leave 退出你所在的岛屿团队
/is accept 同意他人邀请
/is demote 玩家名字 降低一个玩家在你的岛屿的权限
/is category 升级你的岛屿
/is members 查看岛屿的所有成员
/is deny 拒绝他人邀请
/is chat 进入岛屿专门聊天室
/is lock 锁定你的岛屿
/is kick 踢出进入你的岛屿的外来者
/is fire 移除你的岛屿成员
/is promote 提升一个玩家在你的岛屿的权限
/is create 生成器 新建一个岛屿
/is setspawn 为你的岛屿设置新出生点
/is join 加入岛屿
/is cooperate 邀请一个玩家加入你的岛屿
/is disband 解散岛屿

生成器
Shelly
Basic
Lost
OP
Palm

配置文件
# 空岛插件，由 @GiantQuartz 制作

# 除非您知道这里如何修改，否则请不要修改
Version: 1

CustomChestContent:
  basic: []
  lost: []
  op: []
  palm: []
  shelly: []

# 如果你没有在上面特别设定指定生成器刷出的宝箱内容，则会调用下面的默认宝箱内容
# 在这里修改宝箱内容，注意按照格式:
# [物品ID], [特殊值 = 0], [数量 = 1]
ChestContent:
  - "325, 8, 2"
  - "325, 10, 1"
  - "79, 0, 2"
  - "360"
  - "352, 0, 12"
  - "361"
  - "81"
  - "338"
  - "297"
  - "296"
  - "298"
  - "299"
  - "300"
  - "301"

# The amount of slots an island will have in base of their island's category
# The category changes in base of how many blocks have been built on an island
SlotsByCategory:
  XS: 2
  S: 5
  M: 10
  L: 15
  XL: 20

# The amount of minutes a person has to wait to create another island, you can use it to prevent players from spamming
# island creation to slow down your server and/or to prevent them from getting the island chest unlimited times
CreationCooldownDuration: 20

# Should we save your players from dying into the void when they're in their islands?
CancelVoidDamage: true

# The commands that can't be used on the islands
BlockedCommands:
  - sethome
  - home

# The chat format of the messages sent through the private island chat
ChatFormat: "{BOLD}{YELLOW}{username} {GRAY}> {WHITE}{message}"

语言文件message.json
【不能直接替换，仅供参考】
{
  "MUST_ME_MEMBER": "{YELLOW}你必须先成为这个岛屿的成员!",
  "TRY_USING_HELP": "{GREEN}你不知道如何使用SkyBlock系统吗?\n{GREEN}发送指令: {WHITE}/is help",
  "HELP_USAGE": "用法: /is help",
  "HELP_DESCRIPTION": "提供可用的指令的信息",
  "HELP_HEADER": "{RED}___ {WHITE}指令信息 {RED}___",
  "HELP_COMMAND_TEMPLATE": "{GREEN}/是 {name}: {WHITE}{description}",
  "NEED_ISLE": "{YELLOW}你必须成为这个岛屿的一员才能这么做!",
  "NEED_TO_BE_FREE": "{YELLOW}你没有权限这么做!",
  "SUCCESSFULLY_CREATED_A_ISLE": "{GREEN}你已成功创建一个岛屿!",
  "TELEPORTED_TO_ISLE": "{GREEN}你已经被传送到你的岛屿!",
  "CREATE_USAGE": "用法: /is create [generator = Shelly]",
  "CREATE_DESCRIPTION": "创建新岛屿",
  "JOIN_USAGE": "用法: /is join",
  "JOIN_DESCRIPTION": "传送到你的岛屿",

  "MUST_BE_FOUNDER": "{YELLOW}你必须成为这个岛屿的创始人才能这么做!",
  "MUST_BE_OFFICER": "{YELLOW}你必须成为这个岛屿的成员才能这么做!",
  "LOCK_USAGE": "用法: /is lock",
  "LOCK_DESCRIPTION": "锁定或者解除锁定你的岛屿，当你的岛屿被锁定后，只有你和岛屿成员才能访问你的岛屿.",
  "ISLE_LOCKED": "{GREEN}你已成功锁定你的岛屿!",
  "ISLE_UNLOCKED": "{GREEN}你已成功解除锁定你的岛屿!",
  "CHAT_USAGE": "用法: /is chat",
  "CHAT_DESCRIPTION": "切换到全服聊天或者岛屿聊天.",
  "JOINED_ISLE_CHAT": "{RED}> {WHITE}你已加入岛屿聊天室!",
  "JOINED_GLOBAL_CHAT": "{RED}> {WHITE}你已加入全服聊天室!",
  "VISIT_USAGE": "用法: /is visit <玩家名字>",
  "VISIT_DESCRIPTION": "访问一个没有被锁定的岛屿",
  "HE_DO_NOT_HAVE_AN_ISLE": "{name} {YELLOW}并没有一个岛屿!",
  "VISITING_ISLE": "{GREEN}你正在访问 {WHITE}{name}{GREEN}的岛屿!",
  "HIS_ISLE_IS_LOCKED": "{name}{YELLOW}岛屿已锁定，你不可以访问TA的岛屿! :(",
  "LEAVE_USAGE": "用法: /is leave",
  "LEAVE_DESCRIPTION": "离开你所在的岛屿",
  "FOUNDER_CANNOT_LEAVE": "{YELLOW}创始人不能离开自己的岛屿!\n{YELLOW}如果你想要离开你的岛屿, {RED}你将不得不解散你的岛屿",
  "LEFT_ISLE": "{GREEN}你已成功离开这个岛屿!",
  "MEMBERS_COMMAND_HEADER": "{RED}__{WHITE}成员 ({amount}){RED}__",
  "ONLINE_MEMBER": "{BOLD}{GREEN}在线{RESET} {WHITE}{name}",
  "OFFLINE_MEMBER": "{BOLD}{RED}离线{RESET} {WHITE}{name}",
  "MEMBERS_USAGE": "用法: /is members",
  "MEMBERS_DESCRIPTION": "显示这个岛屿的所有成员",

  "CANT_BE_YOURSELF": "{YELLOW}你不能自己邀请自己!",
  "CANNOT_INVITE_BECAUSE_HAS_ISLE": "{YELLOW}无法邀请 {WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}因为他已经是这个岛屿的一员了!",
  "YOU_WERE_INVITED_TO_AN_ISLE": "{RED}> {BOLD}{WHITE}你被邀请成为 {GREEN}{name}的 {WHITE}岛屿的成员!\n{GRAY}* 发送 {WHITE}/is accept {name} {GRAY}来同意TA的请求",
  "SUCCESSFULLY_INVITED": "{GREEN}你已成功邀请 {WHITE}{name} {GREEN}到你的岛屿!",
  "INVITE_USAGE": "用法: /is invite <玩家名字>",
  "INVITE_DESCRIPTION": "加入玩家到你的岛屿",

  "ACCEPT_DESCRIPTION": "允许加入一个岛屿的邀请请求",
  "DENY_USAGE": "用法: /is accept [invitation=last invitation]",
  "DENY_DESCRIPTION": "拒绝加入一个岛屿的邀请请求",

  "ISLE_DISBANDED": "{YELLOW}{BOLD}你的岛屿已被解散!",
  "DISBAND_DESCRIPTION": "删除你的岛屿",
  "DISBAND_USAGE": "用法: /is disband",
  "KICK_USAGE": "用法: /is kick <玩家名字>",
  "KICK_DESCRIPTION": "从你的岛屿踢出一个玩家",
  "KICKED_FROM_THE_ISLE": "{YELLOW}你已被从所加入的岛屿中踢出!",
  "YOU_KICKED_A_PLAYER": "{GREEN}你成功踢出玩家 {WHITE}{name} {GREEN}从你的岛屿上",
  "CANNOT_KICK_A_MEMBER": "{YELLOW}你不能踢出你的岛屿成员!",
  "NOT_A_VISITOR": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}现在已不在你的岛屿了!",
  "FIRE_USAGE": "用法: /is fire <玩家名字>",
  "FIRE_DESCRIPTION": "解雇一个成员从你的岛屿上!",
  "MUST_BE_PART_OF_YOUR_ISLE": "{WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}必须是你的岛屿的一员!",
  "CANNOT_FIRE_FOUNDER": "{YELLOW}你不能解雇岛屿创始人!",
  "SUCCESSFULLY_FIRED": "{GREEN}你已成功解雇 {WHITE}{name}{GREEN}!",
  "YOU_HAVE_BEEN_FIRED": "{YELLOW}你已被从加入的岛屿中解雇!",
  "PROMOTE_USAGE": "用法: /is promote <player>",
  "PROMOTE_DESCRIPTION": "使一个玩家获得更好的权限等级",
  "YOU_HAVE_BEEN_PROMOTED": "{GREEN}你的权限等级已被提升!",
  "CANNOT_PROMOTE_LEADER": "{WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}已经是最高级别的权限了!",
  "OFFICER": "高级成员",
  "LEADER": "管理员",
  "MEMBER": "成员",
  "SUCCESSFULLY_PROMOTED_PLAYER": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}已被提升至 {WHITE}{to}",
  "DEMOTE_USAGE": "用法: /is demote <player>",
  "DEMOTE_DESCRIPTION": "使一个玩家权限等级降低",
  "CANNOT_DEMOTE_MEMBER": "{WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}已经是最低的权限等级了!",
  "CANNOT_DEMOTE_FOUNDER": "{YELLOW}你不能降级这个岛屿的创始人!",
  "YOU_HAVE_BEEN_DEMOTED": "{YELLOW}你已被降级!",
  "SUCCESSFULLY_DEMOTED_PLAYER": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}被降级到 {WHITE}{to}",
  "SET_SPAWN_USAGE": "用法: /is setspawn",
  "SET_SPAWN_DESCRIPTION": "设置岛屿出生点",
  "MUST_BE_IN_YOUR_ISLE": "{YELLOW}你必须先在你自己的岛屿里才能这么做!",
  "SUCCESSFULLY_SET_SPAWN": "{GREEN}成功设置你的岛屿的出生点!",
  "TRANSFER_USAGE": "用法: /is transfer <玩家名字>",
  "TRANSFER_DESCRIPTION": "转让你的岛屿给其他玩家",
  "RANK_TRANSFERRED": "{GREEN}你成功转让你的权限给 {WHITE}{name}.\n{GREEN}你已被降级为成员",
  "GOT_RANK_TRANSFERRED": "{BOLD}{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}转让给你了TA的权限!",
  "PLAYER_INVITATION_DENIED": "{WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}拒绝加入你的岛屿",
  "ISLE_CATEGORY": "{GREEN}你的岛屿已被设置为 {WHITE}{category}.\n{GREEN}让你的岛屿变得更大吧!",
  "ISLE_IS_FULL_BUT_YOU_CAN_UPGRADE": "{YELLOW}你不能邀请任何人到你的岛屿因为你的岛屿已满员!\n{GRAY}* 你可以将你的岛屿提升到更高等级来获取更多的人数上限，下一等级： {WHITE}{next}",
  "ISLE_IS_FULL": "{YELLOW}你不能邀请任何人到你的岛屿因为你的岛屿已满员!",
  "ISLE_BLOCKS": "{GREEN}你的岛屿团队已经放置了 {WHITE}{amount} {GREEN}个方块",

  "BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION": "查看你岛屿的方块数量",
  "CATEGORY_USAGE": "用法: /is category",
  "CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION": "查看你的岛屿的类别",
  "INVITATION_REFUSED": "{GREEN}你拒绝了一份请求!",
  "ALREADY_ON_YOUR_ISLE": "{YELLOW}{name} 已经是这个岛屿的成员了!",
  "ALREADY_A_COOPERATOR": "{YELLOW}{name} 已经是其他岛屿的合作伙伴了!",
  "ADDED_A_COOPERATOR": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}现在可以和你一起合作开发这个岛屿了",
  "NOW_YOU_CAN_COOPERATE": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}给予你TA岛屿的合作权限!",
  "REMOVED_A_COOPERATOR": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}已经不再是合作者了!",
  "NOW_YOU_CANNOT_COOPERATE": "{WHITE}{name} {GREEN}撤回了你在TA岛屿的合作权限!",
  "COOPERATE_DESCRIPTION": "允许其他玩家交互你的岛屿"
  "YOU_HAVE_TO_WAIT": "{YELLOW}要创建另一空岛，你必须等待 {WHITE}{minutes} {YELLOW}minutes!",

replies.txt_content: 你这来源是汉化不知道要表达什么，不应该转载么

replies.author: PQguanfang
replies.txt_content:
2431267050 发表于 2019-9-9 07:07
你这来源是汉化不知道要表达什么，不应该转载么
本来给的模板里面就有汉化这一选项，我这个又不是纯转载，根据基岩版大区规定，汉化和纯转载有区别
